bill.summary: 9/26/1988--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Expresses admiration for the performance of duty by American and Panamanian employees of the Panama Canal Commission during the political unrest in Panama. States that any Panamanian action undermining the safety of American employees shall be considered contrary to the vital interests of the United States.
